English:
Don't just stand there! Hurry up and help me!
If you're not quick about it, I'll arrest you!
Chinese:
喂，別拖拖拉拉的，快點救救我吧！
再不快點，就逮捕你，喂！
Korean:
자, 꾸물거리지 말고 빨리 구해 줘!
빨리 안 하면 체포한다, 임마!
German:
Dein Verbindungssprung hat mich ganz schön verdutzt.
Jetzt weiß ich, was Kyoko mitmacht.

English:
I'm sorry. You see the situation, though.
I'm begging you!
Chinese:
抱歉，如你所見……
拜託了！
Korean:
미안하다, 보다시피 이런 꼴이다…
잘 부탁한다!
German:
Entschuldige, aber du siehst ja, was los ist.
Bitte, bitte!
